DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine adverse event rate nebulized albuterol versus levalbuterol among adult critically ill patient determine differential exists adverse event two drug .
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized , single-blind , cross-over , prospective study conduct seventy critically ill adult patient acute air flow obstruction . Patients randomize nebulized albuterol alternate levalbuterol every 4 6 hour . Group A receive albuterol 2.5 mg alternate levalbuterol 0.63 mg. Group B receive albuterol 2.5 mg alternate levalbuterol 1.25 mg. All patient receive nebulized ipratropium bromide 500 microgram treatment . Heart rate cardiac rhythm continuously record 15 minute finish treatment . Any new rhythm abnormality treatment also record .
DOC.criteria: Adults require inhaled bronchodilator therapy form short act beta adrenergic receptor agonist short act anticholinergic treatment every 46 hour respiratory function Known allergy sensitivity study medication Baseline heart rate great 110 beat per minute
